description:
Do you have a passion for teaching a subject that you love? Do you want to earn extra income on the side? Do you want to start up a successful tutoring business that provides one-on-one or group tutoring to students? Well, then today you have found the online course to help you achieve that goal!

My name is Dmitri and I am a full time tutor. As a current tutor of English Language for over 15 students on a full time basis, I have come to realize all the details that have helped me get to this successful position, and now I want to pass on all these secrets to you, the aspiring tutor!

Did you know?

  • You can start a tutoring business TODAY!
  • Starting up can literally cost nothing (I show you how)!
  • Advertising your services doesn't have to cost you any money at all!
  • Tutoring on the side can be very lucrative!
  • Your full time job won't be affected if you decide to start a tutoring business!
  • The tutoring business sector is massive, and only having a small slice of this can generate large profits.

In this online interactive course, I show you from start to finish how to start up a successful tutoring business, and maintain it so you never run out of new potential students! The tutoring business is highly competitive, BUT, I show you how to cut through all of the competition and come out on top.

In this course, I provide all the answers to these questions:

  • What are all the legal requirements? Don't worry, this is actually quite simple.
  • Which subject should you tutor students?
  • How should I prepare for lessons?
  • What guidelines should I set up for my students?
  • How do I market/advertise my services?
  • How do I ensure my students are long term?
  • How can I make more money through add-ons? I explain this concept to you, so don't worry if you don't know what that means.

I also show you how to get to the top of Google, WITHOUT PAYING A CENT! This is my personal favorite marketing strategy and generated me many new students without spending a cent! I will show you this in my course. I also show you WHERE and HOW to advertise your services on FREE platforms!

This online course is entirely comprehensive, meaning that you can be a seasoned tutor and wish to grow your tutoring business, OR you can be someone who is just getting started today!

This is the type of course that you can decide to view in a day, OR view certain lectures as necessary. Though generally speaking, I recommend you go through the entire course at least once to get your money's worth.

I conduct this course through interactive PowerPoint videos, faced video presentations, as well as screen capture videos, so I actually TALK to you on screen and explain every detail regarding starting up your own tutoring business.

PLUS! Once you have established yourself, I show you how to 'replicate' yourself through Udemy (this platform) and by using this platform, you can reach more students than you thought possible!

So, if you want to create a successful and fun tutoring business, then get started with my online course today!
title: Start a Profitable Tutoring Business - Steps to Success!
